CartItem.name: CartItem
CartItem.description: Represents an item in a WebCart that’s active in a store built with B2B or D2C Commerce. Cart item can be of type Product or Charge.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Non-itemized adjustments for this cart item.

AdjustmentTax​Amount.description: The tax that’s calculated on the AdjustmentAmount.

AssociatedItem​Pricing.description: Specifies how a child cart item is priced relative to its parent cart item within a product bundle. This field is null for standalone products that aren't part of a bundle. Available in API version 65.0 and later.Possible values are: IncludedInBundlePrice—Indicates that the parent product’s price includes the aggregated prices of its child components. NotIncludedInBundlePrice—Indicates that the parent product’s price doesn’t include the aggregated prices of its child components.

CartDelivery​GroupId.description: The ID of the CartDeliveryGroup that’s associated with a cart item.

CartId.description: The ID of the WebCart that’s associated with a cart item.

ChildProduct​Count.description: The total number of child products associated with this cart item. If a child product is a bundle, its own ChildProductCount is included in this total. For simple products that don’t have any child products, the ChildProductCount value is zero.

Configure​DuringSale.description: Specify whether a product bundle is configurable. Available in API version 65.0 and later. Possible values are: Allowed NotAllowed

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD. Possible values are:

DistributedAdjustment​Amount.description: A calculated field that determines the amount of a cart-wide promotional adjustment when distributed across all items in the cart. This field is for display purposes only and is valid only during checkout. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

DistributedAdjustment​TaxAmount.description: A calculated field that determines the amount of a cart-wide tax adjustment due to promotions when distributed across all items in the cart. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

GrossAdjustment​Amount.description: The gross amount of the price adjustment on the cart item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

GrossUnitPrice.description: The gross amount of the unit price for a cart item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

IsShippingChargeNot​Applicable.description: Indicates whether shipping charges are applicable (true) or not (false) to the cart item. The default value is false.

ItemizedAdjustment​Amount.description: A calculated field that determines the total amount of promotional adjustments that are specific to an item. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

ItemizedAdjustment​TaxAmount.description: A calculated field that determines the total amount of promotion-related tax adjustments that are specific to an item. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

ListPrice.description: The original price of the cart item. Typically shown with a line through it. List price is shown only when it’s higher than the negotiated price. If the list price is the same or lower, it isn’t shown to the buyer. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Name.description: The name of this CartItem record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

NetAdjustment​Amount.description: The net amount of the price adjustment made on the cart item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

NetUnitPrice.description: The net amount of the unit price for the cart item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

ParentCart​ItemId.description: The ID of the cart item's parent CartItem. The value is empty if the item is a top-level cart item.

PerUnitWeight.description: Weight per unit of this cart item, in the unit specified by WeightUnit. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Product2Id.description: The ID of a product type cart item. Cart items can be of type PRODUCT or CHARGE.

ProductClass.description: The product class of the cart item. Default value is Simple. Possible values are: Bundle Set Simple Variation VariationParent

ProductRelated​ComponentId.description: The ID of the cart item's ProductRelatedComponent. The ProductRelatedComponent represents a product that is included in a product bundle, a set, or a product and an add-on. The ProductRelatedComponent is empty if the item is a top-level cart item.

ProductValidation​Key.description: The product validation key of the cart item.

ProductRelationship​TypeId.description: The ID of the product relationship type that defines the relationship between a product bundle and its child product. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

Quantity.description: The number of a given cart item in a cart.

QtyScaleMethod.description: Determines how a child product's quantity scales when added to a cart or configured within a product bundle. Available in API version 65.0 and later. Possible values are: Constant—Represents a value that remains fixed relative to the parent bundle. Proportional—Represents a value that varies in proportion to the parent bundle’s price or quantity.

SalesPrice.description: The discounted price of a cart item.

Sku.description: The Shelf-Keeping Unit ID of a cart item.

StockCheck​Method.description: Determines how inventory is assessed for a cart item that’s part of a bundle or set. Possible values are: ChildProducts—Inventory is assessed based on the child product or products. ParentProduct—Inventory is assessed based on the parent product.

SubType.description: Specifies the subtype of the product. Possible values are: Bonus—Bonus product. GiftWrap—Gift wrapped product.

TaxTreatment​Id.description: The ID of the related tax treatment for the cart item. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later. This field is available with Subscription Management.

TotalAdjustment​Amount.description: The total amount of all promotional adjustments on the item, both distributed and itemized. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

TotalAmount.description: The total cost of this cart item, including taxes and adjustments.

TotalLine​Amount.description: Total amount for this cart item, based on sales price and quantity.

TotalLineGross​Amount.description: The total gross amount of the line item (tax inclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

TotalLineNet​Amount.description: The total net amount of the line item (tax exclusive). This is available in API version 55.0 and later.

TotalListPrice.description: Total amount for this cart item, based on ListPrice. We provide this value for comparison. It's not the price that the buyer is paying.

TotalPrice.description: Total amount for this cart item, including adjustments but excluding taxes.

TotalPriceAfterAll​Adjustments.description: Total price after all price adjustments are applied. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

TotalPrice​TaxAmount.description: Total tax amount for a cart item before promotional adjustments, including quantity-based adjustments. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

TotalPromo​AdjustmentAmount.description: Total itemized and distributed adjustment amount in cart (only for promotions). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

TotalPromoAdjustment​TaxAmount.description: Total itemized and distributed adjustment tax amount in cart (only for promotions). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

TotalTaxAmount.description: Total tax amount for this cart item. This value includes taxes for both TotalLineAmount and AdjustmentAmount.

TotalWeight.description: Total weight of this cart item, in the unit specified by WeightUnit. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Type.description: The CartItem type. Possible values are: Product Charge

UnitAdjusted​Price.description: Price per quantity unit after a tier discount or surcharge is applied. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

UnitAdjustedPrice​WithItemAdj.description: Unit price, including both tier and item level discounts, for the item.

UnitAdjustment​Amount.description: Tier discount or surcharge to apply to a quantity unit. This amount is added to the SalesPrice to get the UnitAdjustedPrice. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

UnitItemAdjustment​Amount.description: Item level adjustments made to the unit price for the item.

WeightUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the weight of the cart item. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.
